description:
Escape the ordinary with a truly beautiful collection of island wallpapers designed to fit your Veer. Why do you need this app? Because you don't have time to sift through thousands of so-so images to find the one good one that you want as the background for your Veer. Pacific Island Wallpapers has 101 beautiful images from a tropical island in the Pacific. They are relaxing, interesting, and stunning!

FEATURES
 * 101 images of flowers, beaches, sunsets, birds, fish, and more from the island
 * Unique images you won't find anywhere else!
 * Set the image you are viewing to be the Veer wallpaper with one button Veerss
 * 7 categories make it easy to find the image you want

Think you know what island this is? Go to k2techservice.com/forum to make a guess & see if you are correct.



----------------------

Escape the ordinary with a truly beautiful collection of island wallpapers designed to fit your Veer. Pacific Island Wallpapers has 101 extraordinary images from a tropical island that you won't find anywhere else!
